channel.title: [508] Starting 508 server problem [508]
channel.description:
I am having severe problems running a 508 server. I HAVE SUCCESSFULLY RAN A 317 SERVER!! IT WORKS 100%!! ANYBODY CAN CONNECT!!
I was wondering if there are different port forwarding methods between 317 servers and 508 servers. I have done this:
-Downloaded loads of different sources / clients -Signed up for NO-IP, created a Host, Downloaded NO-IP Duc -Changed Environmental Veriables -Set up a static IP
And yet, every time I try to connect to my server, the client says "Unexpected error has occured. Please try using a different game world." On the CMD for Runserver.bat, I can see "Connection received" from my IP each time I click. And, nobody INCLUDING me can connect, so it must be another problem than portforwarding. Can someone please give me some help? I am getting quite angry >.> I have not downloaded a cache because each time I try the link has been deleted. Is this necessary to load my server? Also, in a lof of my clients, it simply wont load (stays on "Connecting to update server" and in the cmd says "error_game_js5connect" Thanks guys

item.title: [508] Starting 508 server problem [508]
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

to connect yourself to your own server enter it blank or enter

127.0.0.1

for the js5 connect thing try and delete what you portforwarded and do it again it has
happend to me many times before that should work.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Starting 508 server problem [508]
item.dc:creator: @scooterman30 scooterman30
item.description:
@scooterman30 wrote:

I am having severe problems running a 508 server. I HAVE SUCCESSFULLY RAN A 317 SERVER!! IT WORKS 100%!! ANYBODY CAN CONNECT!!

I was wondering if there are different port forwarding methods between 317 servers and 508 servers. I have done this:

-Downloaded loads of different sources / clients
-Signed up for NO-IP, created a Host, Downloaded NO-IP Duc
-Changed Environmental Veriables
-Set up a static IP

And yet, every time I try to connect to my server, the client says “Unexpected error has occured. Please try using a different game world.”
On the CMD for Runserver.bat, I can see “Connection received” from my IP each time I click. And, nobody INCLUDING me can connect, so it must be another problem than portforwarding.
Can someone please give me some help? I am getting quite angry >.>
I have not downloaded a cache because each time I try the link has been deleted. Is this necessary to load my server?
Also, in a lof of my clients, it simply wont load (stays on “Connecting to update server” and in the cmd says “error_game_js5connect”
Thanks guys
